title: Monthly Challenge wrap-up: Elasticsearch
description:
Thanks to everyone who came out and presented at our inaugural Monthly Challenge meetup! We had a great variety of Elasticsearch-related projects. Here's a quick rundown from the night:

  • Our jumpstart blog post introduced a basic analysis of top reddit IAMA posts using Python's elasticsearch client, then visualized some trip history data from Capital Bikeshare using Kibana.
  • Josh Finnie shows how to search and "recommend" beer selections with Elasticsearch. Check out the GitHub repo and
